newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Hopewell calls news conference re CEPA.
newsitem.headline: Hopewell calls news conference re CEPA.

text.p: Hopewell Holdings will hold a news conference in Hong Kong at 4:30 pm (0830 GMT) on Thursday regarding Consolidated Electric Power Asia Ltd (CEPA), a spokesman for the company said.
Representatives from the senior management of Hopewell, CEPA and Southern Electric will be present, the company added in a statement.
U.S.-based Southern earlier announced in Atlanta that its subsidiary Southern Electric International has agreed to purchase a majority stake in CEPA.
Southern will offer HK$18.50 for every CEPA share under its agreement to purchase 80 percent of the company in a deal worth US$2.7 billion, it said in Atlanta on Wednesday.
